text: Saving Grace is a 2000 British comedy movie set in Cornwall. Brenda Blethyn stars in the movie. It premiered at Sundance Film Festival. Critical reaction to this movie was positive. The movie received favorable notice for an independent British comedy; it was nominated for awards. == Other websites == * Category:2000 movies Category:2000s criminal comedy movies Category:British criminal comedy movies Category:Cornwall Category:English-language movies
title: Saving Grace (movie)
